testimonials.title: Customer Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from our customers about their experience with MetaOS

testimonial1.name: John Smith
testimonial1.content: Project management has become much more efficient with MetaOS. The AI assistance has helped us save a lot of time.

testimonial2.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonial2.content: The automated workflows are really helpful. We've significantly reduced repetitive tasks.

testimonial3.name: GuGu Company
testimonial3.content: After implementing MetaOS, our processing time decreased by 60%. It's really convenient that AI automatically designs the project structure.

testimonial4.name: DesignWave
testimonial4.content: Human errors have decreased by 90% thanks to AI-based automation. The real-time analysis feature is particularly helpful for project management.
